name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Proficient in software development, debugging, and database management, I am a Senior Software Engineer with expertise in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular** for building scalable, robust applications. I have a strong background in cloud solutions and application design, ensuring high reliability and user-centric experiences. With a track record in the healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, I leverage standard practices and effective troubleshooting techniques to drive improvements through automation and clean, efficient code, leading to significant operational enhancements.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed comprehensive **cloud solutions** by designing a **microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS)** using **Java (Spring Boot)**, achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking.
• Engineered efficient **application design** through the creation of **RESTful APIs** using **Spring Data JPA**, improving data accuracy by **40%** with secure EHR integration leveraging **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
• Utilized **React** and **Ant Design** to enhance UI/UX for the pathway builder, successfully reducing completion time by **30%**.
• Implemented a robust notification system using **RabbitMQ**, resulting in **99%** timely alert delivery to users.
• Streamlined deployment processes by establishing **CI/CD pipelines** with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, leading to a reduction in deployment times by **80%**.
• Conducted **debugging** and performance optimization by containerizing microservices with **Docker** for efficient staging and production deployments.
• Managed cloud services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, achieving **99.9%** uptime and optimized load handling through **Redis caching**.
• Applied **standard practices** in software development ensuring adherence to **troubleshooting** methodologies for optimal system performance.

• Developed robust **backend services** using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **Node.js**, enhancing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
• Designed a scalable **notification system** with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
• Engineered a customer insights dashboard utilizing **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, which improved resolution rates by **20%**.
• Automated testing and deployment processes with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent release process that meets industry standards.
• Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** using **Docker** and **Terraform**, effectively cutting infrastructure setup time by **50%**.

• Developed and designed reliable backend REST APIs using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **Hibernate**, with **PostgreSQL** as the database, achieving **98% uptime**.
• Practiced standard development methodologies and implemented debugging techniques, leading to a **30% reduction in bugs** through thorough testing initiatives using **JUnit** and **Mockito**.
• Executed application design strategies for optimized frontend performance, utilizing **Angular** to improve load times by **40%** through techniques like lazy loading and code splitting.
• Deployed cloud solutions globally utilizing **AWS CloudFront** and **S3**, ensuring low-latency access and enhancing overall application responsiveness.
• Applied troubleshooting and debugging skills to efficiently solve issues across the software development life cycle.

skills:

	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

  **Backend Frameworks**

  **Frontend Frameworks**
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	RESTful API design

	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

  **Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

  **Other**
	Microservices, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, software development, debugging, cloud solutions, application design, operating systems, networking, standard practices, troubleshooting
